body:
Comment 16: 
I think the overall right approach may be:

1) The go tool runs gccgo to find the default search paths, as in
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/gccgoimporter.

2) For each import PKG, the go tool searches the default search paths looking for
PKG.gox.

3) If PKG.gox is found in the default search path, then use that timestamp.

4) Otherwise, look in GOPATH as usual.
